Package.Name: scanner
Package.Title: Scanner class responsible for scanning and displaying dependency
Package.Description:
Module Operations
The XMLMetadata Generated using the MetadataCreator will hold the info about each package dependency The dependency structure of the metadata xml files is such that if we recursively start traversal of metadata from base pacakge we can fetch the entire project dependency
We supply the base package name as input for Scanning
Module starts by reading the initial XML File for base package Dependencies for the current module are listed and the dependency packages from the XML are used to pick up their respective XML and recursively perform the same action as performed on the base package
Public Interface
ScanPackageRecursePackageName Function call to recursivly traverse metadata starting at the base package GetFiles Function to get the list of all the files traversed
